file_content.text: Don't move.
Weapons steady!
Funny thing is? I thought the Archon was being paranoid. Who keeps tabs on an old drill site?
The Hutt sent you. Why? What was he expecting to find?
What's the Archon doing?
That slug's hooked up to every monitor on the planet. Getting real scared of the Empire.
Told us to capture anyone we found, or kill if we had to. I think we're gonna have to.
Feel those tremors? In a few minutes, this cavern will come down on our heads. We need to get to the shelter.
Listen--we're all in danger!
Back on Wayland, how long did that Sith last?
Under a second. Sniper took his head off.
Okay, then. We've got time.
Pity your master was so attentive. He's only sent you to your doom.
You've come to die. [Attack]
We'll see. Fire at will!
Squad 79 to carrier! We need reinforcements!
Blast it!
I'd prefer to execute you myself... but the cave-in should suffice. Goodbye.
No time to kill you. Pity.
We can still make it out of here. Give me your hand!
Let me help you.
What?
[Head to the shelter]
Damn you!
Time?
Six hours.
Sir, even in the best case, they'd be running out of air.
Sir, she must be running out of air.
Sir, he must be running out of air.
My lord--forgive us for not coming sooner.
Sir! We came as soon as we could.
What's going on back at the gravity hook? Did the information come through?
Give me a status report.
The hook's secure, but about half the team's moved to the mining platform above. We were waiting there while the creatures cleared out.
The important thing is, we survived. You did well--now tell me about the team.
It's okay--you did fine.
You're about six hours late. Maybe you'd prefer I stay buried?
This isn't much of a rescue.
We came in as soon as those creatures cleared out. Set up a base camp on the mining platform.
We got the data, though. Nadrin and the others, they think they can save Makeb.
You said you set up on the mining platform? Make sure it's secure, and you can brief me there.
Let's talk somewhere safer.
Understood.
We're on track after all. What's the plan?
Excellent. Tell me how.
Nadrin has made a few too many mistakes. But he may prove useful for a while longer.
He'll get a stay of execution.
We can go over everything up top. The laser drills are going to be key.
We've got another live one!
Regulator mercenaries, my lord. Buried under the rubble, but still breathing.
Regulator mercenaries, sir. Found them under the rocks. Still alive, if barely.
The mercenaries need to understand who they're facing. Kill most; make the others suffer and send them home.
Make a brutal example of them.
I want their comrades to rethink attacking us again.
Any... particulars you want done?
Psychological Operations Handbook, second appendix. Don't get squeamish.
I had a lot of time to read at the Ministry of Logistics. We'll see you on the platform.
We can't handle prisoners, but I won't let them die. Get them kolto and disable their comms; then they walk.
Treat them and let them go.
On it.
We'll see you on the platform.
